locations.name: Your Dorm Room
locations.brief_description: You are in your dorm room at Chestnut Residence.
locations.long_description: You wake up in a panic in your dorm room at Chestnut Residence. Your desk is cluttered with notes, empty coffee cups, and your laptop—now dangerously low on battery. You need your USB drive, your laptop charger, and your lucky UofT mug! You should retrace your steps! You also know you can’t focus without a drink to keep you energized.

locations.name: Chestnut Lobby
locations.brief_description: You are in the lobby of Chestnut Residence.
locations.long_description: The front desk assistant is busy with some paperwork, and a few students are chatting near the vending machines. Maybe you left something here when you grabbed a snack last night. There is a vending machine and an exit that leads to Elm Street, where you can head towards campus.

locations.name: Outside Chestnut
locations.brief_description: You are outside Chestnut residence

locations.name: Infront of Food Trucks
locations.brief_description: You're in front of the prink and brown food trucks, and Mclennan east of you

locations.name: At Food Trucks
locations.brief_description: You don't have money

locations.name: Outside Bahen
locations.brief_description: You are infront of Bahen

locations.name: Bahen Lobby
locations.brief_description: You are inside Bahen Lobby

locations.name: CSSU Lounge
locations.brief_description: You are inside CSSU Lounge, and meet Sadia, you ask her if she knows where you left your bag last class. She remebers you and says that you must answer the following question to get your bag back...

locations.name: Outside Bahen
locations.brief_description: You are outside Bahen, Mclennan is North and convocation hall is east

locations.name: McLennan
locations.brief_description: You are inside Mclennan

locations.name: West of Kings Circle
locations.brief_description: You are infront of Kings Circle, with MyHall in the distant North, and the Convocation Hall is still East of you

locations.name: Centre of Kings Circle
locations.brief_description: You are now directly in the centre of Kings Circle, you see University College South, and the Convocation Hall east.

locations.name: Infront of Convocation Hall
locations.brief_description: You are now directly infront of Convocation Hall

locations.name: Between University College and Gerstein
locations.brief_description: You now have University College south, and Gerstien to the west

locations.name: Infront Gerstein
locations.brief_description: You are now directly infont of Gerstein

locations.name: Gerstein
locations.brief_description: You are now inside Gerstein

locations.name: In front of University College
locations.brief_description: You are now directly infront of University College

locations.name: University College
locations.brief_description: You are now inside University College

locations.name: Infront of McLennan
locations.brief_description: You have McLennan directly to the west

locations.name: middle
locations.brief_description: You now have Sideny Smith to the East

locations.name: Infront of Sideny Smith
locations.brief_description: You are now directly infront of Sidney Smith

locations.name: Secret Room
locations.brief_description: You are now in secret room

locations.name: Infront of New College
locations.brief_description: You now have New College directly east, and Myhall some distance north

locations.name: New College
locations.brief_description: You are now inside of New College.
locations.long_description: You into New College and see a student with your laptop, you need to confront him.

locations.name: Top Road
locations.brief_description: You now have New College directly south, and Robarts East

locations.name: Infront of Myhall
locations.brief_description: You now have MyHall directly North, and Robarts East
You are now inside MyHall
locations.long_description: You are now inside MyHall, and see your charger plugged into an outlet and your bag sitting on a bench, but on closer inspection you realize that the bag is empty

locations.brief_description: You now have Robarts directly infront of you
You are now inside Robarts
locations.long_description: You remember that you were at two places, the cafe and remeber that you were last at a study table

locations.name: Study Table
locations.brief_description: You are at your old study table in Robarts.
locations.long_description: Your old study table is very cluttered with some of your work that you must've forgot and someone elses, there is someone very tired at your spot, maybe he knows something about your lost stuff, but he is in no state to answer questions. You should maybe give him your redbull

locations.name: Robarts Café
locations.brief_description: You are in Robarts Café on the second floor.
locations.long_description: You remember stopping here for a caffeine boost. A barista is wiping down the counter. Maybe they saw your lucky mug?

locations.name: Barista Counter
locations.brief_description: You are at the counter in Robarts Café.
locations.long_description: The barista recognizes you! 'Hey, you left this behind last night.' Your lucky UofT mug is sitting behind the counter. You better take it with you!

items.name: usb drive
items.description: Your missing USB drive, containing the only copy of your project.

items.name: backpack
items.description: Your missing backpack, should contain all your stuff

items.name: toonie
items.description: A shiny two-dollar coin. Useful for vending machines!

items.name: random student ID
items.description: Your student ID. You can’t access certain buildings without it!

items.name: notebook
items.description: A notebook filled with notes from last night's study session.

items.name: lucky mug
items.description: Your lucky UofT mug, essential for your caffeine-fueled success!

items.name: laptop charger
items.description: A borrowed laptop charger from the computer lab. This will keep your laptop from dying!

items.name: energy drink
items.description: An energy drink from the vending machine to help you focus.
